description: A comic app built with Flutter, supporting multiple comic sources.
notes: The config files are stored in %APPDATA%/com.github.pacalini/pica_comic & %LOCALAPPDATA%/com.github.pacalini/pica_comic
post_uninstall: Write-Output ""; Write-Warning "Now you can remove your data in %APPDATA%/com.github.pacalini/pica_comic & %LOCALAPPDATA%/com.github.pacalini/pica_comic."
